title: Is it permissible to use shampoo & soap while doing ghusl to remove major impurity? assim al hakeem
transcript: uh so is it permissible to use soap and shampoo in quick GLE to Major ritual impurity or we can only use water okay first of all we always stated that the actual ritual which isul is only done by water now most people would like to hit two birds with one stone so they would like to perform russle but at the same same time clean themselves up so they use soap and shampoo there's no problem in that but my advice is to segregate both from one another so either you shampoo your body and hair and use soap then after you wash yourself up in one minute do the proper Gul in the quick hosle that is with water only or do the opposite do the proper quick in one minute or two minutes with water and afterwards now the major ritual impurity has been uplifted you can use soap and shampoo for as long as you wish and Allah Knows Best
